text: The Main road 502 is a short bypass direction Secondary class main road near Szeged, that connects the Main road 5 in the north and south part of the city. The road is long.Magyarország, autóatlasz 1:200.000, Honvédelmi Minisztérium Térképészeti Kht., . The road, as well as all other main roads in Hungary, is managed and maintained by Magyar Közút, state owned company. ==See also== * Roads in Hungary ==Sources== ==External links== * Hungarian Public Road Non- Profit Ltd. (Magyar Közút Nonprofit Zrt.) * National Infrastructure Developer Ltd. Category:Main roads in Hungary Category:Csongrád County
title: Main road 502 (Hungary)
